import React, { useState } from "react"; export default function PizzaCard({ item }) { const [count, setCount] = useState(0); const [sizeIndex, setSizeIndex] = useState(0); return (

{item.title}

  • тонкое
  • традиционное
    {item.sizes.map((size, index) => (
  • setSizeIndex()} key={index} > {size} см.
    • ))}
от {item.price} ₽
setCount((_prev) => _prev + 1)}>Добавить {count}
); }
